changeGroupAdmin(uint256,address).details: Wraps Semaphore's updateGroupAdmin. The new admin must later call acceptGroupAdmin.

returns._0: True if the member exists, false otherwise.

sendFeedback(uint256,uint256,uint256,uin.details: Validates Semaphore proof and creates a post in the specified group

params._content: The content of the feedback/post (stored separately from the proof signal)
params._feedback: The feedback signal (uint256) used in the Semaphore proof - must match what was used to generate the proof
params._merkleTreeDepth: The depth of the Merkle tree
params._merkleTreeRoot: The root of the Merkle tree
params._points: The proof points array (8 uint256 values)

changeGroupAdmin(uint256,address).notice: Initiates a group admin update in Semaphore. Current group admin must call this.

isGroupMember(uint256,uint256).notice: function to check if an identity commitment is member of a group.Returns true if the identity commitment exists in the Semaphore group.

sendFeedback(uint256,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Send feedback with zero-knowledge proof verification via Semaphore
